metadata.title: CVE-2022-4293 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
Floating Point Comparison with Incorrect Operator in GitHub repositoryvim/vim prior to 9.0.0804.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-4293` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.12
vim-athena - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.12
vim-common - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.12
vim-gtk - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.12
vim-gtk3 - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.12
vim-gui-common - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.12
vim-nox - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.12
vim-runtime - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.12
vim-tiny - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.12
xxd - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.12
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.12').
